value.label: Danger Level
value.hint: The danger level of a monster determines their overall challenge as well as their action points.

armor.label: Armor
armor.hint: Armor value reduces incoming physical damage.

value.label: Action Points
value.hint: The number of action points this actor has remaining to spend on actions during combat.

turn.label: Turn Bonus
turn.hint: The number of additional action points this actor receives for each turn it takes in a combat round.

faces.label: Health Pool Faces
faces.hint: The size of each health die.

max.label: Health Pool Maximum
max.hint: The size of the total health pool.

spent.label: Spent
spent.hint: The number of health dice that have been expended.

faces.label: Mana Pool Faces
faces.hint: The size of each mana die.

max.label: Mana Pool Maximum
max.hint: The size of the total mana pool.

spent.label: Spent
spent.hint: The number of mana dice that have been expended.

faces.label: Stamina Pool Faces
faces.hint: The size of each stamina die.

max.label: Stamina Pool Maximum
max.hint: The size of the total stamina pool.

spent.label: Spent
spent.hint: The number of stamina dice that have been expended.

value.label: Points
value.hint: The amount of points to spend.

pool.label: Pool
pool.hint: Choose the pool to increase. You will gain one additional die for every two points spent.

skill.label: Skill
skill.hint: Choose the skill to enhance. You will gain one additional die for every point spent.

expiration.label: Expiration
expiration.hint: Select when this effect automatically expires.

granted.label: Granted
granted.hint: Whether this buff is currently granted.

itemData.label: Item Data
itemData.hint: Stored item data for the item that was destroyed when fusing onto this.

level.label: Level
level.hint: The current level of this status condition.

primary.label: Primary Status
primary.hint: The primary status condition of this effect.

source.label: Source
source.hint: The uuid of the item that granted this buff.

subtype.label: Subtype
subtype.hint: An actor or item type used to determine the available options on the sheet of this effect.

subtype.label: Armor Type
subtype.hint: The type of armor this is, which decides how it is equipped.

subtype.label: Shield Type
subtype.hint: The shield type determines how much it protects the wielder.

value.label: Armor
value.hint: The armor value of this item, which reduces incoming physical damage.

ignore.label: Ignored Properties
ignore.hint: If checked, an item property will not be added via fusions by default when this item is fused onto another.

max.label: Maximum Fusions
max.hint: The maximum number of fusions that can target this item at the same time.

value.label: Price
value.hint: The deemed value of the item.

value.label: Quantity
value.hint: The size of this stack of items.

max.label: Max Uses
max.hint: The total number of uses of this item.

spent.label: Spent
spent.hint: The number of uses of this item that have been spent.

value.label: Weight
value.hint: The amount that this item contributes to its owner's encumbrance.

value.label: Wielding
value.hint: The number of hands required to handle this item.

Pool.label: Pool
Pool.hint: The character's pool of the given type must be at least this large to gain the benefits of wearing this armor.

pool.label: Pool
pool.hint: The pool that must be at least the given size.

value.label: Value
value.hint: The pool size that must be met or exceeded.

Health.label: Health
Health.hint: The character must have this amount of health remaining to gain the benefits of wearing this armor.

value.label: Health
value.hint: The amount of health this character must have remaining.

Level.label: Level
Level.hint: The character must have attained at least this level of experience to gain the benefits of wearing this armor.

value.label: Experience
value.hint: The level of experience the character must have attained.

Skill.label: Skill
Skill.hint: The character must have this many dice in the given skill to gain the benefits of wearing this armor.
Skill.content: At least {value} dice in the {skill} skill.

skill.label: Skill
skill.hint: The skill that must have the given number of dice.

value.label: Value
value.hint: The skill dice amount that must be met.

status.label: Status
status.hint: The condition that will be applied or increased within this region.

autoremove.label: Auto Remove
autoremove.hint: In addition to applying the condition when entering the region, remove or decrease the condition when leaving.

doors.label: Doors
doors.hint: Enter the uuid of the doors whose state is changed by this behavior.

once.label: Once
once.hint: Disable this behavior once it has been triggered.

state.label: State
state.hint: The new state the doors will be set to.

value.label: Action Cost
value.hint: The action point cost to make use of this activity.

formula.label: Formula
formula.hint: The formula used for a defensive roll. If parrying rather than blocking, the amount of dice will be halved.

ids.hint: The transferrable effects this activity will be able to transfer to a target.

formula.label: Formula
formula.hint: The formula that will be rolled to perform the healing.

count.label: Count
count.hint: How many targets this activity can have, or areas of effect this activity creates.

duration.label: Duration
duration.hint: When measured templates created by this activity are automatically removed.

range.label: Range
range.hint: The maximum range between the character and the target.

size.label: Size
size.hint: The length or radius of the created template.

type.label: Type
type.hint: The type of targeting this activity requires, either individual targets or areas of effect.

width.label: Width
width.hint: The width of the created templates.

count.label: Count
count.hint: How many targets can be teleported at the same time.

distance.label: Distance
distance.hint: The distance the target is teleported.

self.label: Self
self.hint: Whether this activity is allowed only to teleports the caster instead of a target.

Warning.ConsumeCostUnavailable: {name} does not have {number} action points available.
Warning.ConsumeOutOfCombat: {name} cannot consume action points when out of combat.
Warning.NoActivities: This item has no activities configured.
Warning.NoDamage: This activity has no damage rolls configured.
Warning.NoDefense: This activity has no defense formula configured.
Warning.NoHealing: This activity has no healing formula configured.
Warning.NoRemainingUses: This item has no remaining uses.
Warning.NoTemplates: This item cannot create measured templates!
Warning.NoToken: A token must be present on the scene.

PoolConfig.SpecializationBalancedFacesHint: A balanced configuration. Each die has the same number of faces.
PoolConfig.SpecializationBalancedSizeHint: A balanced configuration. Each pool has the same size.
PoolConfig.SpecializationFocusedFacesHint: A highly focused configuration. One type of pool has a massive number of faces, but the rest are untouched.
PoolConfig.SpecializationFocusedSizeHint: A highly focused configuration. One type of pool has a massive number of die, but the rest are untouched.
PoolConfig.SpecializationSpecializedFacesHint: A specialized configuration. The pools have a small, medium, and large number of faces.
PoolConfig.SpecializationSpecializedSizeHint: A specialized configuration. The pools have a small, medium, and large amount of dice.
PoolConfig.Title: Configure Pools: {name}

amount.label: Amount
amount.hintCurrency: The amount of chrons to award. Each recipient will receive this amount.
amount.hintPoints: The amount of points to award. Each recipient will receive this amount.

targets.label: Recipients
targets.hint: The members of this party that will be awarded.

ItemFusionDialog.SplitHint: Select the active fusion to split off this item. The source item will be restored.
ItemFusionDialog.Title: {source}: Fuse

ProgressionDialog.Title: {name}: Create Progression
ProgressionDialog.TypeHint: Choose the type of progression to add to the character.
ProgressionDialog.WarningNoPoints: This actor has no progression points to spend!

EquipDialog.Label: Item
EquipDialog.Hint: Select the item to equip in this slot.
EquipDialog.Title: Change Equipped Item
EquipDialog.Warning: You have no items that can be equipped in that slot.

DefenseDialog.Title: Defense Roll: {name}
DefenseDialog.ItemsHint: Choose any of your equipped arsenal to defend against the attack and reduce incoming damage.
DefenseDialog.Content: {name} is about to take {damage} damage. You can attempt to parry or block to reduce the damage by an amount equal to the rolled totals.

LootDialog.Title: {name}: Grant Loot
LootDialog.Content: Grant the loot from this monster ({name}) to the primary party? The loot will be removed from the monster.

SkillsDialog.Title: {name}: Roll Skill
SkillsDialog.Hint: Select two skills to combine for the roll, adding together their dice and bonuses.

Setting.CircularTokensHint: Are tokens treated as circular for the purpose of their hit area?
Setting.TemplateAreaThresholdHint: The percentage a token must overlap a template to be considered 'inside' it. The default is 0.4.
Setting.TokenBarLengthHint: The length of token bars, in degrees. The default is 120.

Warning.InvalidActiveEffectType: The chosen effect type is not valid for this parent.
Warning.MissingActionPoints: You do not have enough Action Points to perform that action.

StatusConditions.BleedingHint: {actor} takes {level}d6 physical damage at the start of every round.
StatusConditions.BurningHint: {actor} takes {level}d12 fire damage at the start of every round.
